name: Connection Lost (Millama-Chan)
description:
Playing and learning: 

In this game not only you can have fun fighting threats from an infected connection on the internet, but you also have the opportunity to read and learn about types of computer viruses that are attacking this fictional user ( CautiousUser123 ) system and how they affect it.  

Special-ops 220619: 

Programmed by the Strike-Back Defense AI system security application, your mission is to protect the system of the unsafe connections established by a very careless user

Features

A simple animated tutorial to help you get started and 2 levels to test your concentration and strategy abilities

 I hope you like cute enemies because as usual, I had to try to make all enemies cute...

Not every update is a good update,  {CautiousUser123 }  obviously wouldn't take the risk so they did not update their anti-virus...

  • Old limited software  =  no upgrades for the towers during the game

As they usually say :  If it  was too easy is woudn't be fun... So thanks {CautiousUser123 } for making our experience... intriguing. 

Maybe they might install an update in the future, who knows what might happen until the end of the game

There are many references and easter eggs in this game. From quotes, to looks, to gameplay and maybe even scenes, can you find them all?

See how much you've improved by checking out the latest scores from each level. Can you get a perfect score on all of them?

CONTROLS:
  • Left mouse Button to select, confirm and build towers
  • Right mouse Button to cancel any actions
